name: Frigophobia
description:
Frigophobia is a first person psychological horror game where the player is investigating the death of his two friends. Upon exploring the map more is being discovered regarding the deaths, all while the player is trying to escape a mysterious creature. Frigophobia is a project which 8 College students produced for their Final Major Project where they were tasked to explore culture within their game - thus Frigophobia was created within 3 months of production time.

  3D Character Artist  - Fadil Beeharry

  Freelance 3D Artist - Tajay Williams

 Gameplay Programmer - Christian Navarro

 Gameplay Programmer - Mikey Crowhurst 

Sound Designer/3D Artist - Chris Ashiku 

UI Artist/3D Art - Zahir Shahzad 

2D Artist - Ellicia Okandju 

2D Artist - Emily Vo
